sentence.Network_en: She is so reticent about her achievements.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对自己的成就缄口不言。

sentence.Network_en: He was reticent about his opinion.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方英语四级词汇30天学习笔记（3） - 豆丁网 ... nakedness 赤裸裸的事实 reticent 沉默不语的 tolerant 忍受.
雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... retain vt. 保持;保有;聘请(律师) reticent a. 沉默寡言的,言不如意的 retrospect n. 回顾,回想.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... arrest 阻止，逮捕 reticent 沉默的 revere 尊敬.
赵丽词汇8000电子讲义第2-5讲 - 豆丁网 ... cent 钱，一分钱 reticent 沉默不语 intimate 亲密的；详细的.

list.abs: His reticence is more revealing than his speech ., 他的沉默所表露的要胜过他的言词.

the mermaid in the deep sea , it is brilliant that no matter how lights on the bankare . debark , what is done ? is a beautiful one interspersed , or a reticent onlooker ?深海中的人鱼，无论岸上灯火如何辉煌．上岸，去做什么?一个美丽的点缀，还是一个沉默的旁观者？
He always displays a certain reticence in discussing personal matters ., 他在谈论个人问题时总显得有些保留.
reticent knowledge and classroom teaching of teachers ., 教师的缄默知识与课堂教学.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin reticent- 'remaining silent', from the verb reticere, from re- (expressing intensive force) + tacere 'be silent'

entry.tran: 沉默寡言的;不与人交谈的
entry.def: Someone who is reticent does not tell people about things.

example.ex: She is so reticent about her achievements...
example.tran: 她对自己的成就缄口不言。

example.ex: Mrs. Smith, normally a reticent woman, took it upon herself to write to the President.
example.tran: 通常都很沉默的史密斯夫人决定自己给总统写信。

means.word_mean: 3. reluctant to draw attention to yourself

auth_sentence.content: Obama looked coiled and reticent when he stepped forward.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama looked coiled and reticent when he stepped forward.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Obama looked coiled and reticent when he stepped forward.

auth_sentence.content: She said that she is reticent to quote numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content: She said that she is reticent to quote numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She said that she is reticent to quote numbers.

auth_sentence.content: I was reticent, and she did not press me.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was reticent, and she did not press me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was reticent, and she did not press me.

means.word_mean: 不轻易暴露思想或感情的;有保留的

sentences.en: He was reticent about his opinion.
